meanings.definition: The study or practice of taking X-ray images of the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: In renographies, doctors use special machines to see inside the kidneys.
meanings.sent2: The hospital technician performed renographies to check the health of the patient's kidneys.
meanings.sent3: During the renographies, the doctor joked that the kidneys looked like beans on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The renographies revealed the kidneys' secrets hidden beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: Through renographies, the kidneys appeared like mysterious shapes in the body.

meanings.definition: The process of creating images of the kidneys using radiography.
meanings.sent1: The detailed renographies helped diagnose the kidney problem accurately.
meanings.sent2: Modern technology has improved the accuracy of renographies in capturing kidney images.
meanings.sent3: The renographies process seemed like magic, turning the kidneys into visible pictures.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in renographies turned the kidneys into works of art on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The renographies process made the kidneys stand out like stars in the body.

meanings.definition: The medical imaging technique used to visualize the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on renographies to get a clear view of the kidneys' condition.
meanings.sent2: The hospital invested in advanced equipment for performing renographies on patients.
meanings.sent3: During the renographies, the technician accidentally captured a funny image of the kidneys.
meanings.sent4: The renographies technique painted a vivid picture of the kidneys' health.
meanings.sent5: The renographies technique brought the kidneys into sharp focus for diagnosis.
